item.description:
Shamballa Multi-Dimensional Healing

Witches have always had the ability to do hands-on healing,
Now you can too! :)

Shamballa is the energy beyond Reiki and there are
(4) levels to the Master Degree,
which is equivalent to a Reiki Master Degree.

Level l - Heal Yourself & Others Hands On
Level ll- Long Distance Healing
Level lll- Attune To Level l Only
Level lV- Master Teacher- Attune & teach all Levels
______________________________________
You may take just one level, or all four levels to Master


This will be the first of (4) Levels of Shamballa to learn Hands on Healing for yourself,
other people, and animals, and hands- on healing practice.

Class is $50.00 for attunement and class. (cash, check, paypal)
Included in the class each student receives a Shamballa booklet, class notes, and practice with hands-on energy healing, and a certificate to highest level completed.

Each level builds upon the other, and you must take each level before continuing on.

Snow date will be discussed, please check email for cancellation
item.name: Shamballa Level 1- Evening Class
